name: Daq_Vid
text: I suppose I've never met you, and I never will.

name: Daq_Vid
text: Well, I can only send my great thanks.

name: Daq_Vid
text: Knowing that I have a lot of stories to tell,

name: Daq_Vid
text: And with the most fantastic team,

name: Daq_Vid
text: I can't really have much to complain about.

name: Daq_Vid
text: Leaving a note to myself in this game, and maybe to you all...

name: Daq_Vid
text: You rocked out a 2 week trip. Everything went south, everything could have been worse...

name: Daq_Vid
text: Most importantly though, you did your best, and you kept the commitment up, soldier.

name: Daq_Vid
text: Stay strong. I know you'll have to endure all the stabs and gut punches.

name: Daq_Vid
text: Being a Game Developer was never this easy, especially at a young age.

name: Daq_Vid
text: I believe in you. You'll make it out.

name: Daq_Vid
text: Don't cry about it. It'll all be worth the pain, for your true success in life.
